TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MoveSelectedHandler(object o, MoveSelectedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed MoveSelectedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the MoveSelectedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the MoveSelectedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the MoveSelectedHandler is removed from the event.
